name: xdg-utils
desc: Command line tools that assist applications with a variety of desktop integration tasks
optdepends: exo: for Xfce support in xdg-open
kde-cli-tools: for KDE Plasma5 support in xdg-open
pcmanfm: for LXDE support in xdg-open
perl-file-mimeinfo: for generic support in xdg-open
perl-net-dbus: Perl extension to dbus used in xdg-screensaver
perl-x11-protocol: Perl X11 protocol used in xdg-screensaver
xorg-xset: for X11 support in xdg-screensaver
xorg-xprop: for X11 support in xdg-screensaver
